mapper.insert: insert into bms_operation_record (id, object_id, operation_type, operation_content, creater_id, creater_org_id, creater_name, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{objectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createrOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update bms_operation_record set object_id = #{objectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operation_content = #{operationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creater_id = #{createrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creater_org_id = #{createrOrgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, creater_name = #{createrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, object_id, operation_type, operation_content, creater_id, creater_org_id, creater_name, create_time from bms_operation_record where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
